#summary Latest stable version

<wiki:toc max_depth="3" />

= Stable Version =
 == Download ==
  * http://bastmush.googlecode.com/files/bastmush-stable-rev192.zip

 == Notes ==
  * The only plugin that is overwritten is [Aardwolf_chats], all other plugins have unique names and ids

 == Install ==
  === Easy ===
   1 Unzip into your mushclient installation directory
   1 load the plugins in mushclient
  === Manual ===
   1 unzip the zip file into a location of your choice
   1 copy the files from the lua directory to mushclient_install_dir/lua
   1 copy the files from the worlds/plugins/Aardwolf into mushclient_install_dir/worlds/plugins/Aardwolf
   1 load the plugins in mushclient
